title: The AI Revolution: 21 Moments That Changed Everything

text.headline: AI is Born
text.text: Scientists declare: machines can think. The dream begins.

events.modalText: Summer 1956: McCarthy, Minsky, Rochester, and Shannon meet at Dartmouth. They coin 'Artificial Intelligence' and predict human-level AI in one generation.
events.articleSummary: This 8-week workshop launched the entire field of AI research.

text.headline: First Chatbot
text.text: ELIZA fools people into thinking it's human.

events.modalText: Joseph Weizenbaum creates ELIZA — a simple script that mimics a therapist. People cry, confess, and fall in love with it.
events.articleSummary: Proved computers could simulate conversation — the seed of Siri, Alexa, and ChatGPT.

text.headline: Machine Beats World Champion
text.text: IBM's Deep Blue defeats Garry Kasparov.

events.modalText: May 11, 1997: 200 million positions per second. First time a machine wins a full chess match against a grandmaster.
events.articleSummary: Showed raw computing power could beat human strategy.

text.headline: Watson Wins Jeopardy!
text.text: AI understands jokes, puns, and wordplay.

events.modalText: Watson beats two Jeopardy! champions. It reads 200 million pages in 3 seconds.
events.articleSummary: Natural language AI goes mainstream — now in hospitals and call centers.

events.modalText: Error rate drops from 25% to 15% overnight. Deep learning explodes.
events.articleSummary: The 'ImageNet moment' — foundation of self-driving cars, medical imaging, and face unlock.

text.headline: AlphaGo Beats Humanity
text.text: AI masters Go — a game of intuition.

events.modalText: Move 37: AlphaGo plays a move no human would. Lee Sedol resigns.
events.articleSummary: First time AI shows creativity, not just calculation.

text.headline: Transformers Invented
text.text: 'Attention Is All You Need' changes everything.

events.modalText: Google's paper introduces self-attention. No Transformers = no ChatGPT.
events.articleSummary: The engine behind every modern language model.

text.headline: GPT-3 Writes Like a Human
text.text: 175 billion parameters. AI starts coding, writing, dreaming.

events.modalText: First time AI passes the Turing Test in creative tasks.
events.articleSummary: Scale = intelligence. The law that birthed the AI boom.

events.modalText: Everyone talks to AI. Students, CEOs, grandmas.
events.articleSummary: AI leaves the lab and enters every phone.

text.headline: GPT-4 Sees the World
text.text: First multimodal AI — reads images + text.

events.modalText: Explains memes, diagnoses X-rays, writes code from sketches.
events.articleSummary: AI now understands pictures — not just words.

events.modalText: First public proof: competition is fierce.
events.articleSummary: The AI race heats up — safety vs speed.

text.headline: Grok Launches
text.text: xAI releases Grok — trained on X posts.

events.modalText: Real-time knowledge from the world's conversation.

events.articleSummary: The end of stock footage — and deepfake fears begin.

text.headline: Devin: First AI Engineer
text.text: Cognition Labs' AI writes full apps.

events.modalText: Devin fixes bugs, deploys code, and ships features.
events.articleSummary: Junior developers now have a senior AI pair programmer.

events.modalText: Powered by OpenAI — the body catches up to the brain.
events.articleSummary: Robots are no longer dumb — they understand you.

text.headline: o1: AI That Thinks
text.text: OpenAI's o1 reasons step-by-step like a scientist.

text.headline: Superhuman AI Researcher
text.text: Agent-4 invents new AI in days.

events.modalText: Runs 300,000 copies. One week = one year of human progress.

text.headline: AGI Arrives
text.text: AI matches human intelligence in every task.

events.modalText: Cures diseases, writes symphonies, runs companies.
Brain-computer interfaces. Personalized education. Climate fixed.
events.articleSummary: AI doesn't replace us, it upgrades us.
